description: Generated when a probe failure is detected when the
corresponding pingCtlTrapGeneration object is set to
probeFailure(0) subject to the value of
pingCtlTrapProbeFailureFilter. The object
pingCtlTrapProbeFailureFilter can be used to specify the
number of successive probe failures that are required
before this notification can be generated.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingProbeFailed DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddressType i 0 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddress s EXAMPLE DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsOperStatus i 1 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddressType i 0 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddress s EXAMPLE DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsMinRtt u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsMaxRtt u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsAverageRtt u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsProbeResponses u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsSentProbes u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsRttSumOfSquares u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsLastGoodProbe s EXAMPLEE

description: Specifies the type of host address to be used at a remote
host for performing a ping operation.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddressType

description: Specifies the host address to be used at a remote host for
performing a ping operation. The host address type is
determined by the object value of corresponding
pingCtlTargetAddressType.
A value for this object MUST be set prior to transitioning
its corresponding pingCtlEntry to active(1) via
pingCtlRowStatus.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddress

description: Reflects the operational state of a pingCtlEntry:
enabled(1) - Test is active.
disabled(2) - Test has stopped.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsOperStatus

description: This objects indicates the type of address stored
in the corresponding pingResultsIpTargetAddress
object.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddressType

description: This objects reports the IP address associated
with a pingCtlTargetAddress value when the destination
address is specified as a DNS name. The value of
this object should be a zero length octet string
when a DNS name is not specified or when a
specified DNS name fails to resolve.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddress

description: The minimum ping round-trip-time (RTT) received. A value
of 0 for this object implies that no RTT has been received.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsMinRtt

description: The maximum ping round-trip-time (RTT) received. A value
of 0 for this object implies that no RTT has been received.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsMaxRtt

description: The current average ping round-trip-time (RTT).
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsAverageRtt

description: Number of responses received for the corresponding
pingCtlEntry and pingResultsEntry. The value of this object
MUST be reported as 0 when no probe responses have been
received.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsProbeResponses

description: The value of this object reflects the number of probes sent
for the corresponding pingCtlEntry and pingResultsEntry.
The value of this object MUST be reported as 0 when no probes
have been sent.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsSentProbes

description: This object contains the sum of the squares for all ping
responses received. Its purpose is to enable standard
deviation calculation. The value of this object MUST
be reported as 0 when no ping responses have been
received.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsRttSumOfSquares

description: Date and time when the last response was received for
a probe.
variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsLastGoodProbe

description: Generated when a ping test is determined to have failed
when the corresponding pingCtlTrapGeneration object is
set to testFailure(1). In this instance
pingCtlTrapTestFailureFilter should specify the number of
probes in a test required to have failed in order to
consider the test as failed.

event.Summary: Ping test failed for host $v2. Last response received at: $v12

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingTestFailed DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddressType i 0 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddress s EXAMPLE DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsOperStatus i 1 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddressType i 0 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddress s EXAMPLE DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsMinRtt u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsMaxRtt u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsAverageRtt u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsProbeResponses u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsSentProbes u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsRttSumOfSquares u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsLastGoodProbe s EXAMPLEE

host for performing a ping operation.

variables.name: DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsLastGoodProbe

description: Generated at the completion of a ping test when the
corresponding pingCtlTrapGeneration object is set to
testCompletion(4).
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingTestCompleted DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddressType i 0 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingCtlTargetAddress s EXAMPLE DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsOperStatus i 1 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddressType i 0 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsIpTargetAddress s EXAMPLE DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsMinRtt u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsMaxRtt u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsAverageRtt u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsProbeResponses u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsSentProbes u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsRttSumOfSquares u 9999 DISMAN-PING-MIB::pingResultsLastGoodProbe s EXAMPLEE
